attributes.action: take legislative action now to ensure that any financial penalty levied by the EU for the criminal act which cancelled the SFO investigation is borne by the politicians/SFO officials who committed the criminal act and MUST NOT be passed on to the taxpayer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a blatant case of criminal activity - under EU terms - and when we voted our politicians into power we did not give them carte blanche to commit criminal acts in our name.  It is only right therefore that any fines or other financial penalty levied by the EU in punishment should be paid by the individuals who committed the crime.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
